languages.text: Огромные трубы — артерии корабля — тянутся через множество отсеков, доставляя воздух, воду, тепло, движущую силу пара.
Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.
languages.original_text: Огромные трубы — артерии корабля — тянутся через множество отсеков, доставляя воздух, воду, тепло, движущую силу пара.

traits.locale_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.
Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.
Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.
Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

languages.text: 无数巨大的管道如同这艘船的动脉一般，贯穿了许多层甲板，输送空气、水、热量，以及用来推动机械的蒸汽。
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: 无数巨大的管道如同这艘船的动脉一般，贯穿了许多层甲板，输送空气、水、热量，以及用来推动机械的蒸汽。

languages.text: Las grandes tuberías que sirven de arterias de la nave recorren sus muchas bahías, distribuyendo aire, agua, calor y la fuerza impulsora del vapor.
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: Las grandes tuberías que sirven de arterias de la nave recorren sus muchas bahías, distribuyendo aire, agua, calor y la fuerza impulsora del vapor.

languages.text: 船の動脈である巨大なパイプが多くのベイを貫き、空気、水、熱、そして蒸気の推進力を送り届けている。
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: 船の動脈である巨大なパイプが多くのベイを貫き、空気、水、熱、そして蒸気の推進力を送り届けている。

languages.text: Riesige Rohre — die Arterien des Schiffs — verlaufen durch unzählige Buchten und transportieren Luft, Wasser, Wärme und Dampfkraft.
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: Riesige Rohre — die Arterien des Schiffs — verlaufen durch unzählige Buchten und transportieren Luft, Wasser, Wärme und Dampfkraft.

languages.text: D'immenses tuyaux, les artères principales du vaisseau, parcourent de nombreux compartiments qu'ils alimentent en air, en eau, en chauffage et en vapeur, la source de propulsion du bâtiment.
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: D'immenses tuyaux, les artères principales du vaisseau, parcourent de nombreux compartiments qu'ils alimentent en air, en eau, en chauffage et en vapeur, la source de propulsion du bâtiment.

languages.text: Birçok bölmeden geçen bu dev borular, geminin damarları. Hava, su, ısıtma ve buharın itici gücünü taşıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Huge pipes — the arteries of the ship — run through many bays, delivering air, water, heat, and the propulsive force of steam.

traits.locale_text: Birçok bölmeden geçen bu dev borular, geminin damarları. Hava, su, ısıtma ve buharın itici gücünü taşıyorlar.
